diagnosis_num_nulls.description: Number of null entries encountered when calculating diagnosis.

communication.description: Communication. Subscore used in assigning diagnosis.

social_interaction.description: Social interaction. Subscore used in assigning diagnosis.

restricted_repetitive_behavior.description: Restricted repetitive behavior. Subscore used in assigning diagnosis.

QA01.description: Overall level of non-echoed spoken language

QA02.description: Does your child display Speech abnormalities associated with autism (intonation/volume/rhythm/rate

QA03.description: Does your child display Immediate echolalia

QA04.description: Does your child display Stereotyped/idiosyncratic use of words or phrases

QA07.description: Does your child display Descriptive, conventional, instrumental, or informational gestures

QB01.description: Does your child display Unusual eye contact

QB02.description: Does your child display Facial expressions directed to others

QB03.description: Does your child display Shared enjoyment in interaction

QB04.description: Does your child display Response to name

QB06.description: Does your child display Spontaneous initiation of joint attention

QB07.description: Does your child display Response to joint attention

QB08.description: Does your child display Quality of social overtures

QB09.description: Does your child display  social overtures/maintenance of attention to examiner

QB10.description: Does your child display Quality of social response

QB11.description: Does your child display reciprocal social communication

QC01.description: Does your child display Functional play with objects

QD01.description: Does your child display Unusual sensory interest in play material/person

QD02.description: Does your child display Hand and finger and other complex mannerisms

QD03.description: Does your child display Self-injurious behavior

QD04.description: Does your child display Unusually repetitive interests or stereotyped behaviors

QE02.description: Does your child display Tantrums, aggression, negative or disruptive behavior
